Name: Electric
About the game: No electricity? Is the Internet not working? It needs to be repaired! Feel like an electrician in a fun logic puzzle game with a view from above - the Electric game. Bring energy into the house and save people from boredom and despondency by moving power lines and building closed routes for the correct flow of current. There are many levels, simple and complex, which will require you not only logic, but also speed. Become the country's chief electrician with Electric!
